TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Cookie extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组用于管理 Cookie 的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides a set of properties and methods that are used to manage cookies.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由客户端应用程序用来检索有关收到了 HTTP 响应的 cookie 的信息。The class is used by a client application to retrieve information about cookies that are received with HTTP responses. HTTP 响应标头的分析过程支持以下 cookie 格式： 原始的 Netscape 规范、 RFC 2109 和 RFC 2965。The following cookie formats are supported during parsing of the HTTP response headers: the original Netscape specification, RFC 2109, and RFC 2965. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅各种构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the various constructors. ## Examples 下面的示例将请求发送到 URL，并显示在响应中返回的 cookie。The following example sends a request to a URL and displays the cookies returned in the response. [!code-cpp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CPP/cookiessnippets.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CS/cookiessnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/VB/cookiessnippets.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 通常，应用程序无需构造 类，因为该类会基于通过 HTTP 响应接收的 Set-Cookie 标头自动创建。

span.span: In general, an application does not need to construct a class because it is created automatically based on the Set-Cookie header received with the HTTP response.

summary.span: 获取或设置服务器可添加到 中的注释。

span.span: Gets or sets a comment that the server can add to a .

value.span: 用于记录此 预定用途的可选注释。

span.span: An optional comment to document intended usage for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端可以检查此可选备注，由服务器添加的信息。The client can inspect this optional comment for information added by the server. 例如，服务器可能包括有关隐私策略或预定用途类似的问题的信息。For example, the server could include information about issues like the privacy policy or intended usage. ## Examples 下面的示例显示响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`true`，此属性指示客户端应用程序不能保存在会话结束时的用户的硬盘上。When `true`, this property instructs the client application not to save the on the user's hard disk when a session ends. ## Examples 下面的示例显示响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器不能指示的域不自己的 URI。A server cannot indicate a domain other than its own URI. 但是，它可以表示多个服务器域中。However, it can indicate more than one server in the domain. 默认值是收到了来自此 cookie 的宿主。The default value is the host that this cookie has been received from. ## Examples 下面的示例显示响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. summary.span: 重写 方法。

span.span: Overrides the method.

returns.span: 此实例的 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: The 32-bit signed integer hash code for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能被用作哈希表中的键的类必须提供此重写时，因为使用的键的哈希表的对象所需通过此方法生成自己的哈希代码。Classes that might be used as a key in a hash table must provide this override, because objects that are used as keys in a hash table are required to generate their own hash code through this method.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 适用于的 TCP 端口的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of TCP ports that the applies to.

value.span: 此 适用于的 TCP 端口的列表。

span.span: The list of TCP ports that the applies to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此特性将端口限制此可能会发送。This attribute restricts the ports to which this may be sent. 默认值表示没有限制。The default value means no restriction. 将此值设置为空字符串 ("") 将限制为在 HTTP 响应中使用的端口。Setting this to the empty string ("") will restrict the port to the one used in the HTTP response. 否则，值必须是一个带双引号的字符串，包含用逗号分隔的端口值。Otherwise, the value must be a double-quoted string that contains port values delimited with commas. ## Examples 下面的示例显示响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. [!code-cpp[NCLCookies#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CPP/cookiessnippets.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLCookies#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CS/cookiessnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLCookies#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/VB/cookiessnippets.vb#3)]

exception.span: 无法分析为集合运算指定的值或者该值没有用双引号括起来。

span.span: The value specified for a set operation could not be parsed or is not enclosed in double quotes.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的安全性级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the security level of a .

value.span: 如果客户端仅在使用安全超文本传输协议 (HTTPS) 的后继请求中返回 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the client is only to return the cookie in subsequent requests if those requests use Secure Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTPS); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实际上，当此属性是`true`此 cookie 可能仅随 https:// 请求一起发送。In effect, when this property is `true` this cookie may be sent only with https:// requests. ## Examples 下面的示例显示响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 的不得`null`。The of a must not be `null`. 如果`null`值分配给此属性，它将被替换为一个空字符串。If a `null` value is assigned to this property, it's replaced with an empty string. 分号和逗号是不能在此属性的值的保留的字符。Semicolons and commas are reserved characters that cannot be used in the value of this property. 将无效的字符分配给此属性不引发异常;但当你尝试添加此到实例与方法，该操作将失败并引发异常。Assigning invalid characters to this property doesn't throw an exception; but when you try to add this to a instance with the method, the operation will fail and throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例显示响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. summary.span: 获取或设置此 Cookie 符合的 HTTP 状态维护版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the version of HTTP state maintenance to which the cookie conforms.

value.span: 此 Cookie 符合的 HTTP 状态维护版本。

span.span: The version of HTTP state maintenance to which the cookie conforms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为属性为 0，遵守原始 Netscape 规范。The default value for the property is 0, complying with the original Netscape specification. 如果值显式设置为 1，则此必须符合 RFC 2109。If the value is explicitly set to 1, then this must conform to RFC 2109. 请注意，如果接收集 Cookie2 HTTP 响应标头，一致性设置为 RFC 2965 通过自动创建。Note that if a was created automatically by receiving a Set-Cookie2 HTTP response header, the conformance is set to RFC 2965. 尝试设置属性设置为小于零的值将引发异常。An attempt to set the property to a value less than zero will throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例显示响应中返回的 cookie 的属性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 有关完整示例，请参阅类主题。For the complete example, see the class topic. exception.span: 不允许使用为版本指定的值。

span.span: The value specified for a version is not allowed.
